pageContext.course_type_long_description: With Halloween just around the corner, it's time to get out your decorations and get ready for trick-or-treaters! Build spooky ghosts and other moving decorations, learning about gear drives and other engineering concepts along the way. With tens of thousands of LEGO® bricks, we know your Halloween display will be simply "gourd-geous"!
pageContext.course_type_name: Spooktacular Halloween Workshop with LEGO® Materials
